sentence: pic.twitter.com/8AWWLhMxNy — Scott Morefield (@SKMorefield) January 12, 2022 RELATED: GOP Senator Slams ‘Least Trusted Bureaucrat’ After Fauci Is Caught On Hot Mic Calling Him A ‘Moron’ Carlson Excoriates ‘Filthy Little Demagogue’ Fauci Carlson said at the beginning of his monologue, “Turns out, Tony Fauci’s even more loathsome and complicit even than his toughest critics ever alleged.” “Today, two Republican congressmen, James Comer and Jim Jordan, released emails that show Fauci was warned by scientists at the very beginning of the Corona pandemic this virus very likely leaked from the Wuhan Institute of Virology,” Carlson said.
author: John Hanson
title: Tucker Carlson Goes All In: Blasts Fauci As ‘Filthy Little Demagogue’

sentence: The signers are House Republican Whip Steve Scalise, plus Reps. James Comer, Jim Jordan, Mark E. Green, Nicole Malliotakis and Mariannette Miller-Meeks.
author: Jennifer Harper
title: CBP shows American heroism on the southern border

author: Sam Dorman
title: HHS, NIH under fire from House GOP seeking answers on Wuhan's COVID origins

sentence: Reps. James Comer, R-Ky.,, a member of the Oversight and Reform Committee; Steve Scalise, R-La., the minority whip and ranking member of the Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Crisis; and Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, ranking member of the Judiciary Committee, have questioned whether these scientists felt pressure from top health officials like Dr. Antony Fauci and Dr. Francis Collins.
author: Caitlin McFall
title: Top oversight Republicans call on 7 scientists to testify on COVID origins, Wuhan lab leak
